step.text: $$$/Tutorial/Tap the tool bar and scroll to the Magic Wand tool.=Tap the tool bar and scroll to the Magic Wand tool.
$$$/Tutorial/Tap Tolerance. Increase tolerance to 50% to prevent edge artifacts.=Tap Tolerance. Increase tolerance to 50% to prevent edge artifacts.
step.tiptext: $$$/Tutorial/To type numbers instead of using a slider, tap the number field to display a number keypad. Enter the numbers and tap the checkmark to complete.=To type numbers instead of using a slider, tap the number field to display a number keypad. Enter the numbers and tap the checkmark to complete.

step.text: $$$/Tutorial/Tap the red area of the sign to select it.=Tap the red area of the sign to select it.

$$$/Tutorial/Tap the Add to Selection icon. Tap the areas inside the #{quot}O#{quot} and #{quot}P#{quot} to add them to the selection.=Tap the Add to Selection icon. Tap the areas inside the #{quot}O#{quot} and #{quot}P#{quot} to add them to the selection.
$$$/Tutorial/Tap Adjustments > Color Balance. Enter Red:-100, Green:-100, Blue:100. Tap Apply.=Tap Adjustments > Color Balance. Enter Red=-100, Green=-100, Blue=100. Tap Apply.
